a:
You're a data wrangler extraordinaire! You love exploring data, cleaning messes, and transforming it into a usable format.
Tidyverse packages like dplyr, ggplot2, and tidyr are your best friends.
b:
You're a statistical powerhouse! You thrive on building models, testing hypotheses, and uncovering insights from data.
Tidymodels packages like rsample, recipe, and parsnip are your go-to tools.
c:
You're a visualization whiz! You love creating interactive dashboards and applications that bring data to life.
Shiny is your perfect partner, allowing you to build user-friendly and engaging experiences.
d:
You're a code craftsman! You prioritize clean, maintainable, and scalable code.
Rhinoverse offers the tools and best practices to help you build enterprise-grade Shiny apps you can be proud of. Rhinoverse packages like shiny.semantic, shiny.router, and rhino are your go-to tools.
